DIA_PrisonGuard_HELLO_03_02: Remember, don't let them give you a slum patrol and you might survive the first week.
DIA_PrisonGuard_HELLO_15_03: Actually, I've already been there. It wasn't that bad.
DIA_PrisonGuard_HELLO_03_04: Maybe they took you for a girl and that's why they didn't bother you! An extremely ugly girl!
